member.name: XAUDIO2_BUFFER_WMA
member.summary: Used with when submitting xWMA data.

member.name: XAUDIO2_BUFFER_WMA.pDecodedPacketCumulativeBytes
member.summary: Decoded packet cumulative data size array, each element is the number of bytes accumulated after the corresponding xWMA packet is decoded in order, must have PacketCount elements.

member.name: XAUDIO2_BUFFER_WMA.PacketCount
member.summary: Number of xWMA packets submitted, must be >= 1 and divide evenly into the respective .AudioBytes value passed to .
